item.title: About us
item.description:
dandik.systems grew out of an idea of collaborative notebook, a place meant to be writing down thoughts and ideas - even if they are dandik as hell - before they vanish.

If you want to contribute a weird, rough, or a dandik idea, weâ€™d love to have you here. Weâ€™re mostly into mathematics right now, but who says it has to stay that way? Donâ€™t hesitate to reach out!

Math Typesetting

You can use LaTeX math in your posts. For inline math, use single dollar signs, e.g. $F = ma$.

item.title: About
item.description: A group blog about math, but probably we’ll write about other things too.
